values.value: A documented lift plan is required for all critical lifts, including but not limited to: Lifting loads over employees, over occupied buildings/sidewalks/roadways, Lifts exceeding 75% of the crane's capacity, Within specified limits of energized power lines, Lifting personnel, & Helicopter lifts. CFR 1926.751, ASME B30.5 Appendix A
Has a lift plan been documented as required and are all lift activities being conducted according to this plan?
